name: Flip Knight (preatomicprince)
description:
My first ever game jam entry

Made for the Mildly Infuriating Game Jam

An infuriating  platformer staring a knight who can't help but flip upside down when he jumps, inverting the controls

A classic platformer experience, with the twist of inverted controls while jumping. 

Most definitely infuriating, but with enough blood, sweat, tears, skill, patience and strategy, it is certainly possible to master this game.

Controls:

Left and Right Arrows/ A and D -- Move left and right

Up Arrow/ W -- Jump

Space -- Dash

R -- Restart Level

Type a level code on the start scree to skip back to that stage

Jam Theme:

There's destructible blocks, and destruction is necessary to progress. 

Hopefully it's  also infuriating enough for everyone's tastes.

Credits:

Art/Design/Code -- Me

Font -- Silverfinster by Heaven Castro on fontspace.com

Music and Sound Effects -- All by SubspaceAudio on opengameart.org
